name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasLimitsOfShape_of_essentiallySmall
initialProofState:
J : Type u₂
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} J
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.EssentiallySmall.{w₁, v₂, u₂} J
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfSize.{w₁, w₁, v₁, u₁} C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J C
decl:
theorem hasLimitsOfShape_of_essentiallySmall [EssentiallySmall.{w₁} J]
    [HasLimitsOfSize.{w₁, w₁} C] : HasLimitsOfShape J C :=
  hasLimitsOfShape_of_equivalence <| Equivalence.symm <| equivSmallModel.{w₁} J

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasColimitsOfShape_of_essentiallySmall
initialProofState:
J : Type u₂
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} J

inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.EssentiallySmall.{w₁, v₂, u₂} J
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfSize.{w₁, w₁, v₁, u₁} C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape J C
decl:
theorem hasColimitsOfShape_of_essentiallySmall [EssentiallySmall.{w₁} J]

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasProductsOfShape_of_small
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
β : Type w₂
inst✝¹ : Small.{w₁, w₂} β
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasProducts C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasProductsOfShape β C
decl:
theorem hasProductsOfShape_of_small (β : Type w₂) [Small.{w₁} β] [HasProducts.{w₁} C] :
    HasProductsOfShape β C :=
  hasLimitsOfShape_of_equivalence <| Discrete.equivalence <| Equiv.symm <| equivShrink β

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasCoproductsOfShape_of_small
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
β : Type w₂
inst✝¹ : Small.{w₁, w₂} β
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasCoproducts C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasCoproductsOfShape β C
decl:
theorem hasCoproductsOfShape_of_small (β : Type w₂) [Small.{w₁} β] [HasCoproducts.{w₁} C] :
    HasCoproductsOfShape β C :=
  hasColimitsOfShape_of_equivalence <| Discrete.equivalence <| Equiv.symm <| equivShrink β
